title: Containment
key_events: Adrian adjusts to quarantine facility life
Discovers facility was former psychiatric hospital
Prescribed antipsychotic medication, doesn't take it
Sera organizes first Changed network meeting
Seventeen Changed individuals arrange in geometric circle
Discussion of suicide cases from Goldstone team
Dr. Okonkwo observes meeting, asks about Stage 4
Adrian finds belonging among other Changed

character_development.Adrian: Developing critical perspective on Sera's leadership, experiencing belonging for first time, accepting transformation trajectory
character_development.Sera: Acts as network coordinator, pushes for collective organization, describes resistance as causing suffering

planted_elements: Goldstone suicides explained - resistance to change causes suffering
Network forming consciously, not just instinctively
transformation_stage: Stage 1 - Enhanced pattern recognition overwhelming, finding patterns in everything, collective perception beginning
cosmic_horror_elements: The seduction of belonging through transformation
Suicide as response to unbearable change
themes: Belonging vs. humanity as competing values
The price of resisting inevitable change
